headline: BIRTH CONTROL REJECTED; Massachusetts Margin Against Proposal Now Totals 200,000
BIRTH CONTROL ROW STIRS CONNECTICUT; Catholic Pastors Fight Ballot Call of Planned Parenthood League in the State
snippet: DANBURY, Conn., Oct. 31 -- A warning was sounded today from the pulpits of Roman Catholic churches here and in neighboring communities against the support in Tuesday's election of local candidates who have endorsed a proposal to legalize in this...

headline: NEW ENGLAND; Heavy Massachusetts Vote Is Sought on Birth Control
snippet: BOSTON, Sept. 18 -- Birth control, an explosive subject in Massachusetts politics, promises to bring additional thousands of voters to the polls on Nov. 2.

headline: WORLD BIRTH CONTROL GOAL OF 4-NATION UNIT
snippet: CHELTENHAM, England, Aug. 27 (AP) -- A four-nation committee was formed today to promote birth control on an international scale.

headline: SURGEONS WARNED BY PIUS; Pope in Address Condemns Sterilization and Birth Control.
snippet: Pope scores sterilization, birth control and operations sacrificing infant for mother, s, Internatl Surgical Cong

headline: Birth Control Bill Killed
snippet: Massachusetts Sen defeats bill initiated by Planned Parenthood League

headline: 'Agitators' of Moral Controversy Denounced by Archbishop Cushing; Boston Prelate, at Family Life Conference, Assails All Who Stir Up Inter-Faith Dissension on Birth Control
snippet: HARTFORD, Conn., March 9 -- Efforts of "agitators" who seek to stir up debate between Roman Catholics and Protestants on birth control, were assailed here tonight by Archbishop Richard J. Cushing of Boston. The prelate spoke at a meeting in the...
